dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S936 IS: To amend the Ohio & Erie Canal National Heritage Canalway Act of 1996 to repeal the funding limitation.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Brown introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Ohio & Erie Canal National Heritage Canalway Act of 1996 to repeal the funding limitation.

section.text: Section 810(a) of the Ohio & Erie National Heritage Canalway Act of 1996 (Public Law 104â€“333; 110 Stat. 4275; 122 Stat. 826) is amended by striking the second sentence.
